body.p: FSFE will participate in the Croatian Open Systems Conference in Zagreb.

FSFE's president Karsten Gerloff will speak about technology, power and control (May 15, 11:00), and discuss FSFE's work to build a free information society (May 16, 9:00). Matija Å uklje, FSFE's legal coordinator, will hold a clinic to answer questions on licensing and other legal aspects of Free Software.
